ThingDef.label: great white shark
ThingDef.description: A large species of mackarel shark. Feared for their power and sharp teeth, they live mainly in warm waters and prefer to hunt large prey.

ThingDef.label: hammerhead shark
ThingDef.description: A large species of sphyrnidae shark. Recognized by the unique and striking head they have, they live mainly near coastal regions feeding on medium size prey.

ThingDef.label: tuna
ThingDef.description: A large carnivorous fish. Will eat anything they can swallow whole. Fortunately, they are not large enough to swallow people.

ThingDef.label: sea snail
ThingDef.description: A diminutive aquatic mollusk. Food for fish and otters.

ThingDef.label: red snapper
ThingDef.description: A carnivorous fish. Will eat anything they can swallow whole. Fortunately, they are not large enough to swallow people.

ThingDef.label: manta ray
ThingDef.description: Manta ray, closely related to sharks, can be found in warm, subtropical and tropical waters. Migrates across open oceans, singly or in groups.
